thread.title: Ryan urges Trump take 'surgical' approach on tariffs

title: Ryan urges Trump take 'surgical' approach on tariffs
text:
Ryan urges Trump take 'surgical' approach on tariffs Tuesday, March 06, 2018 - 02:01 
The most powerful member of the U.S. House of Representatives said on Tuesday that President Donald Trump’s planned tariffs on steel and aluminum imports are too broad and open the country to possible retaliation, adding that he encouraged the White House to more narrowly focus its approach.   
The most powerful member of the U.S. House of Representatives said on Tuesday that President Donald Trump’s planned tariffs on steel and aluminum imports are too broad and open the country to possible retaliation, adding that he encouraged the White House to more narrowly focus its approach.  //reut.rs/2oTyvut
